resources.string: Add a new rail from Shortrain shortcuts menu (Long press)
Tap the rail to build it, (Adding a new rail before building the last one will have devastating consequences)
Further taps will change the rail direction. Rails can be removed, but not moved. Do not move them!
Add as much starting stations as you wish
Press the starting point and let the fascinating, magnificent and marvelous magic train roll on your screen
Please drag the starting point to your homescreen
